amendment.description: To provide funding for competitive grants for construction of agricultural research facilities and related activities, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1113 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1113 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5160-5163) To provide funding for competitive grants for construction of agricultural research facilities and related activities, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1113 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1113 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 1092.
